content: In question "Please rank your top 5 programming languages in terms of preference:" there is a note: "Please only select 1 per column - Google Forms will not allow you to unselect an option once clicked.". It doesn't seem to be correct any more. I was able to unselect the option by clicking on it again.
Also in the list of the languages I think we are missing Kotlin (we do have Clojure and Scala). I do understand that this is more actionable for 2021 survey.

Yerkebulan Tulibergenov said:

Also in the list of the languages I think we are missing Kotlin (we do have Clojure and Scala). I do understand that this is more actionable for 2021 survey.

More programming languages was definitively one of the most voted addition for the 2020 survey :-) but we had to drop the idea because of lack of time to update and keep aligned all the surveys
I created a google doc to keep notes on 2021 survey, this would be in addition to the notes from last year (which I need to go find...)
